attributes.action: Facebook Steve - Lower the Duty on Oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lower the duty on oil (petrol and diesel) to stop choking the economy.

You are charging enough on taxes already, make it fare for all people and businesses large and small.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/cut-fuel-costs/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
